::DarkMouse::
She looked at Inferno. "OK, let's go. Lead the way."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Inferno grabbed Darkmouse and looked deeply into her panicing 
eyes. 
> "Megatron is dead. Kitkat killed him. We must get back to the 
Royalty so she 
> can get her. We must hurry!"
> 
>     Megatron slammed down his cold hard fist on the display. They 
had 
> discovered his little secret. No matter.....phase two of the plan 
would go as 
> followed. He wasnt going to let anything stand in his way....and 
would pave 
> over any bot who stood in his way of complete, total, and utter 
destruction 
> of the Autobots.
>     "Terrorsaur! Get in here now!"
> 
>     Hell Beast saw the on coming fire and rolled out of the way, 
looked up, 
> and saw they had stoped. "Cowards. And Kitkat....dont think you 
have won, 
> because I will have the last laugh. Gremlin, cut that net down and 
bring the 
> body." He said, standing up and walking over to the net. Indeed, 
Hell Beast 
> was going o have the final, and most deserved laugh.
> 
>     Black Aracnia, Paralysis, Rampage, and Tankkor, waited on the 
bridge, and 
> watched as Megatron exploded before there eyes. She couldnt belive 
it, and 
> didnt belive it.
>     "Alright, Rampage and Tankkor, you go and have a look around 
for 
> Megatron. I want him found....and Inferno and Darkmouse had best 
return 
> soon!"
